extendedInfo.description: The most iconic British film locations in history. This application will not only map out the most famous film scenes around your Google maps location, it will allow you to search by film title. So discover an entire Great British film tour whether you're looking for Harry Potter's Hogwarts or Braveheart's battlefields.

reviews.comment: Too few locations listed, even for the films they have. Camera option crashes app on Desire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Re-installed several time
reviews.comment: Still Gives all locations as it\'s\"local to me\" & @ 0 distance.. With or without GPS on. Nothing in gallery. Un-installed now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work for me
reviews.comment: Whether GPS is on or not everywhere is shown as 0 miles away.  Now uninstalled.
reviews.author: Paul Baxter

reviews.comment: Film buffs like myself should lap this up! Great idea... it also geo tags the photo\'s you take so you can view where they were taken on the map!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Took it a while to work out I wasn\'t in London, but nice app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Great idea for an app. Could be improved with more content, particularly in the gallery sections. However, the content that is there is very interesting. I now feel compelled to seek out the Waterman\'s Arms.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think overall, ace app and would give it 5* if you could type a destination urself. Who knew I lived round the corner from a movie location HTC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great idea but there\'s not a single photo posted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Misses out alot local to north london
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Couldn\'t search by town or city
reviews.author: A Google User
